about_the_game:
"Gustao: Kingdom Rebirth" is an action game produced by the student team

The story is mainly about the Gustavo empire. It is an empire ruled by women. After the death of the queen of the previous generation, Princess Nali, who should have succeeded to the throne, was arrested by her sister and exiled to the border of the Gustavo Empire. The player will play the heroine Nali. Step by step to save the empire that was taken and ruled by her sister. In the process of saving the crushed city in the empire, Nali found that the empire seemed to have changed in the two years when she was imprisoned. It seems that there is someone behind it. all of these......

game content

Get ready for the fantastic adventure in the Gustavo Empire, play Princess Nali to explore this country that has changed dramatically in two years, pick up your Axe to conquer all the enemies that block you, they are trying to stop you from uncovering this The truth hidden behind the empire!
  • Four Axe with different attributes
  • Four types of skill combinations
  • Two thrilling Boss battles
  • Three maps with different styles, and each map is free to explore
  • Complex elements and plots

Important notes for executing the game

This game file contains three languages, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and English. When you "execute" the game through the Steam main program, there are three options.

The first option is "Traditional Chinese version"
The second option is "Simplified Chinese"
The third option is "English version"

Thank you for your preemptive experience test

I hope that players will like the game we are developing, and that players who participate in the test will return all the problems you have encountered or hope to improve and join the game, etc. We will continue to update this game to make him better!
detailed_description:
Release of the second update (full language synchronization)

Since the game was listed a few days ago, I received a lot of suggestions.
So urgently release the first update file here.
This update is mainly to correct the game's various error content.

The following is a correction project

1. Optimize the game card problem
I split the first map of the game opening into two pieces for optimization.
Separate the border and coastal areas from the church area, reducing the burden on the player to read the map again

2. Monsters and difficulty repair
Correct the action of the monster (especially the counterattack problem after the knight monster is attacked)
Slightly lower the monster's blood volume and slightly increase the monster's chance

3. Optimize the operation of the main character
Improve the running speed of the main character and the speed of the stairs
The protagonist will move forward slightly when performing the general attack
Increase the moving distance of the roll
The protagonist will reply some micro magic value every five seconds.
The interface to kill monsters to gain experience points is obvious
Dual weapon switching tips
The camera on the main character can now adjust the distance.

4. Other
Optimization of the second BOSS room (many players say that the game crashes often)
Physical collision of walls in the second BOSS room
Digital display box modification when critical strike
The text of the blacksmith shop has not penetrated the wall.
Join a small story related tip
Join a weapon type

5. Add monster type and new weapon props

Many players gave me a lot of responses to the games released a few days ago.
I am really sorry for the troubles caused by the players.
Also trouble players, please reply directly to any questions in the future game.
I will continue to correct the game!!
